title: Terminator 2
description: In this sequel set eleven years after "The Terminator," young John Connor (Edward Furlong), the key to civilization's victory over a future robot uprising, is the target of the shape-shifting T-1000
shortDescription: Terminator sent from the future to kill

title: American Hustle
description: A con man, Irving Rosenfeld, along with his seductive partner Sydney Prosser, is forced to work for a wild F.B.I. Agent, Richie DiMaso, who pushes them into a world of Jersey powerbrokers and the Mafia.
shortDescription: Sydney Prosser, is forced to work for a wild F.B.I. Agent

title: A Star Is Born
description: A musician helps a young singer find fame as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral.

title: World War Z
description: Former United Nations employee Gerry Lane traverses the world in a race against time to stop the Zombie pandemic that is toppling armies and governments, and threatening to destroy humanity itself.
shortDescription: Traverses the world in a race against time to stop the Zombie pandemic

title: Dog Day Afternoon
description: A man robs a bank to pay for his lover's operation, which turns into a hostage situation and a media circus.
shortDescription: Leads a bank robbery in Brooklyn

title: The Accountant
description: As a math savant uncooks the books for a new client, the Treasury Department closes in on his activities, and the body count starts to rise.
shortDescription: The movie's main storyline of an accountant/hit man with autism

title: Death at a Funeral
description: Chaos ensues when a man tries to expose a dark secret regarding a recently deceased patriarch of a dysfunctional British family.
shortDescription: Man tries to expose a dark secret
